Ayorinde Ayomide David is a budding data analyst with a B.Sc. in Statistics from the Federal University of Agriculture, Abeokuta. With a strong foundation in statistical methods and a passion for data-driven solutions, he specializes in transforming raw data into actionable insights to support research, business, and policy decisions.

He currently serves as a Journey and Tracking Manager at KaySky Nigeria Limited, where he oversees fleet performance, delivery efficiency, and compliance. He also contributes remotely as a Research Assistant at the Institute of Health Research and Development, supporting literature reviews, data cleaning, and research reporting.
